entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasi] Invariant.Tests failing to run - regression #85616
    8.0.0
  • Attribute definitions included in assemblies using Nullable on the latest framework #85612
  • [Fuzzlyn] Failure for another complex expression #85611
    8.0.0
  • JIT: SSA follow up work #85609
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeMap[type] != TYP_UNDEF' in 'Test.Program:testEquals(System.Numerics.Vector3):int' during 'Morph - Structs/AddrExp' #85608
  • [hot reload][coreclr] cumulative updates to properties in generic classes crash the runtme. #85605
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: string/ReadOnlySpan<char> Truncate #85603
  • [Fuzzlyn] Failure for complex expression #85602
  • OSX build error: Removing global symbols from a final linked no longer supported #85600
  • [wasm-mt] Multithreading and JavaScript async interop in .NET 8 #85592
    8.0.0
  • Test Failure - `Interop` work item #85591
  • Test Failure - `jit64_do.0.1` #85590
  • iOS/tvOS simulators ran out of trampolines of type 1 #85582
    8.0.0
  • Convert To 'LibraryImport' with 'W' suffix creates invalid code #85578
    8.0.0

Closed

  • DependencyGraphViewer: VS experimental designer fails for editing NodeForm #84538
  • [API Proposal]: `SignatureTypeEncoder.TypedReference()` #80812
    8.0.0
  • Typo in SafeHandle.cs - Reported by Visual Studio's spell checker #85593
  • Question: Does System.IO.Hashing.XxHash3 uses the fastest instruction set by default if available? #85614
  • Test failure: _Avx512F_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Avx512F.Program.ConvertToVector256UInt16WithSaturationVector512UInt32() #85469
    8.0.0
  • Test failure _Avx512F_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Avx512F.Program.ConvertToVector256UInt16Vector512UInt32() #85586
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.FileStreamFlushAsyncThreadPoolDeadlockTest #85211
    8.0.0
  • Test Failure - `Assertion failed 'varTypeMap[type] != TYP_UNDEF' in 'System.Numerics.Tests.QuaternionTests:QuaternionCreateFromYawPitchRollTest2():this' during 'Morph - Inlining'` #85589
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\VS-ia64-JIT\\V1.2-M02\\b28158\\b28158_64\\b28158_64.cmd #74632
    8.0.0
  • SslStreamCertificateContext has public fields in its implementation that aren't in the contract #72226
    8.0.0
  • False positive for `SYSLIB1006` when user haven't specified `EventID` #72263
    Future
  • Most recent MIBC optimization data contains a combo of block and edge counts crashing JIT in Crossgen2 #84446
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Land the webworker JSImport support #84489
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Dotnet WASM: Application crash after ~ 15 minutes #85587
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(refPosition->refType == RefTypeUpperVectorRestore) || (genCountBits(candidates) == 1)' during 'LSRA build intervals' #85426
    8.0.0
  • Add Function Pointer support to Native AOT Reflection #71883
    8.0.0
  • JIT: suboptimal codegen for isinst + cast pattern #85522
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Interop/NativeLibrary/API/NativeLibraryTests/NativeLibraryTests.sh #85212

PullRequests

Created

  • [JIT]: Inline TLS field access for GC type #85619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up dead code in ILCompiler targets #85618
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi] Combine `main` function for the default and single file bundle #85617
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix TimeZoneInfo Perf #85615
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Fix new warnings found with CA1854 improvement. #85613
    area-Meta, needs-area-label
  • [JIT] X64 Fix - Handle 'imul' instruction variants to determine if a register was written to #85610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete the concept of "location" values from local morph #85604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "[NativeAOT] Do not strip exported symbols from executables on Apple platforms (#85293)" #85601
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add `count` and `sum` to Histogram for System.Diagnostics.Metrics #85595
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Skip DllImportSearchPathsTest on wasm #85588
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-mono, 6.0.x
  • Move assignment rationalization to before the late helper expansion phases #85585
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Constant folding for SIMD comparisons #85584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ComWrappers test that allocate object can't inline #85583
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Fix typo in SafeHandle.cs #85607
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • DependencyGraphViewer: Fix catastrophic designer fail for NodeForm #84539
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support encoding `TypedReference`s in signatures. #85360
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove a RequiresProcessIsolation which is not required. #85606
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Save interfaces implementations and nested types #85596
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Translate AV in RhpByRefAssignRef to NullReferenceException #85575
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT instruction for NixOS #81485
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure that IF_*WR_RRD formats support 4-byte SIMD instructions #85594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Fix trimmability issues in Quic test #85579
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Compare host using OrdinalIgnoreCase instead of InvariantCultureIgnoreCase #85574
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • JIT: one phi arg per pred #85546
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable a test which doesn't seem to fail any more. #85576
  • Set lvSingleDef for non TYP_REF locals #85398
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable regex to use IndexOf(..., OrdinalIgnoreCase) for prefix searching #85438
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • fix: Change severity for SYSLIB1006 to Info instead of warning #85581
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Revert "[mono][llvm] Enable the cold calling conv on osx/linux. (#835… #85554
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Improve vectorization of IndexOf(chars, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) #85437
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Split assignment rationalization into a separate phase #85180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not set pre-decided consecutive registers as busy (again) #85566
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix processing of x86 test results #82301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove cached Type instances #85557
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Refactor deduplication to use enum instead of flags #85384
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Delete finally blocks in EcmaSignatureParser #85577
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Emission and reading of custom modifiers #85504
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Make optAssertionPropGlobal_RelOp less conservative for side-effects #85532
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete more type equivalence logic #85507
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete `arrayArgumentsFound` logic from type loader #85509
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `ExperimentalAttribute` #85444
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allocate Array.Empty<> on a frozen segment (NonGC heap) #85559
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Run NativeAot tests on arm64 #82307
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • DependencyGraphViewer: Feature add same window navigation for NodeForm #84542
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add request metrics to System.Net.Http #85447
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Add new SafeHandleMarshaller type to provide out-of-generator marshalling support. #85419
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Transform indirect calls to direct ones in the importer #85197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop passing around struct handles in importer #85561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #81115
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some xarch emit logic #85536
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prefer lld in NativeAot when using clang #85478
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Address misc feedback for config binder implementation #84737
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix(70460): Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [WIP] Make the RefreshMemoryLimit API public #85549
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Rework JIT<->EE communication for struct promotion; add support for general recursive struct promotion #85569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move `ASG` rationalization to just after global morph #85494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_FIELD` #85568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Allow wildcards when looking for nodes #82386
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Use Vector128 and Vector256 in interface cast #83000
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use 1MB fallback stack when procfs fails #83271
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #84250
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Implement Vector128.Shuffle using tbl1 on arm64. #85553
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • offers the synchronous part of start and stop in IHostedService to run concurrently #85191
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Flow TasksConfiguration in build & specify generator config #84931
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo14::GetNonGCHeapBounds #85434
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use cinv instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI emits default constructors when reading from metadata #32165
  • Failed to install Microsoft.AOT.win-x64.Cross.android-x86.6.0.16-x64.msi. #32157
  • GenAPI emits compiler generated members when internals are included #32152

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable preview branch codeflow going forward #32161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make TryGetInternalDefaultConstructor work without internal metadata #32145
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • An initial take at fixing the use of aliases.First() across the templating codebase #32144
    untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.13.0 to 19.14.0 in /eng/dependabot #32143
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.1 to 19.14.0 in /eng/dependabot #32142
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Merged

  • Remove reference to 'BINDING' in 'BlazorHotReload.js' #32121
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32126
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Try installing wasm-tool from a rollback file instead of from the feed #32107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dependabot to run on 4xx #31837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet-watch: Enable nullable annotations on project level #32137
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Lightbulb Perf] Expose FilterSpan/FilterTree public API on remaining analysis contexts #68033
    17.7

Closed

  • A possible opportunity for optimization in ImmutableArrayExtensions.GetTypesFromMemberMap #67991
    17.7
  • An opportunity for optimization in ImmutableArrayExtensions.CreateNameToMembersMap #67990
    17.7
  • C# implict operators don't work with tuples #68045
  • `foreach` autocompletion should be offered when ctrl+. is pressed on a variable representing a collection #60628
    Backlog
  • Move the SyntaxTree and SemanticModel action based analyzers to respect context.FilterSpan #67888
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert BindingDiagnosticsBag into a struct #68046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove specialized C# and VB subtypes of BindingDiagnosticBag #68044
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make existing instance methods on BindingDiagnosticBag into extensions #68043
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove need for inheritance in BindingDiagnosticBag #68042
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove non-generic BindingDiagnosticBag #68041
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make diagnostic bag argument non-nullable #68038
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix crash when alias is referenced in an expression. #68037
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make OrderBy binary compat across TFMs #68036
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • LocalBinderFactory - visit erroneous ForEachVariableStatementSyntax.Variable to prepare it for error recovery binding. #68034
    Area-Compilers, 17.7

Merged

  • Check ILegacyGlobalOptionsWorkspaceService is null in GenerateConstructorFromMembersCodeRefactoringProvider #68024
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup/perf in creating member maps. #67997
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update VSSDK Build tools version #68039
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update Publish.json after VS snap #68040
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Create file based on project path if the file path is null in LSP code action handler #68006
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets: Add inline statement snippets #67819
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Using Scouting queue to move forward with the code flow #68023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #67994
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • .editorconfig only shows as dirty with changes #68021
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` branch #68031
    Area-Compilers
  • Move the SyntaxTree and SemanticModel action based analyzers to respect context.FilterSpan #68014
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics, Next

Updated

  • Update semantic token names to conform be spec compatible #68047
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Feedback on caching constructed Nullable<T> types #67807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Create new vsix for x64 .NET ServiceHub services #65471
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve parsing of switch expressions whith missing `}` or `]` #67943
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Convert bad expressions for error recovery #68011
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, 17.7
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.4 release branch #67903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix internal compiler error when handling DynamicObjectCreationExpression #68030
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Implement support for Inline Array conversions #68019
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Flatten merged namespaces #67891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use SymbolLocations.FirstOrDefault instead of TryGetFirstLocation #67890
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Implement ISymbol.LocationList #67881
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Reduce allocations due to StateSet enumerations of project/activefile states. #67662
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate using Microsoft.DotNet.SharedFramework.Sdk #48013
  • DefaultModelBinder doesn't handle Uri property type correctly #48009
  • ALWAYS include the `Vary: Accept-Encoding` header when response compression is enabled #48008
  • Clean out projects from AspLabs repo #48007
  • Documentation for ValidateScopes and ValidateOnBuild in minimal apis #47999
  • Cookie accidentally shared between subdomains of my application? #47998
  • `IHttpContextScopedAccessor` for accessing `HttpContext` from request scoped DI components #47996

Closed

  • Hosting bundle still restarts on Repair and Uninstall when /norestart is passed #47544
    Infrastructure
  • I set in the server that a client certificate it is needed, but the server responses when the client doesn't include any client certficate #47952
  • code-generator run twice creates CS0433 #47976
  • [blazor] Remove reference to BINDING api in global namespace #47878
    8.0-preview5
  • The Input Tag Helper renders DateOnly properties with an invalid date format #47628
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: single_query #47997
  • Should MapShortCircuit matches for all methods or only GET? #47981
    8.0-preview5
  • Components in if statement inside for loop is destroyed regardless of @key #48006
  • IDE0005 error when building with latest SDK #47932
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, mvc #47153
  • ASP.Net Core 7 Identity Email Confirmation "Invalid token" Error. #47032
  • Does healthcheck close the connection properly? #47989

PullRequests

Created

  • Expand support for MapX methods in RDG #48012
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b5fd99b` to `797b0ad` #48004
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `6caf299` to `ecc4e18` #48003
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b5fd99b` to `797b0ad` #48002
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Fix DateOnly format for Input Tag Helper #47957
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • Guard ILogger calls that do work at call site #47837
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `fe9fa08` to `ecc4e18` #48005
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.6
  • Fix MapShortcircuit docs. #47995
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • Resolve CA2201: No Reserved Exceptions #47873
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add metrics to rate limiting #47758
    area-runtime
  • Use the DisplayName and Display attributes to obtain the display name of a property #47993
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Fix RequestBody logging when zero byte read is used #47811
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Swapping the MainPage out with the same instance of FlyoutPage crashes the app #14866
  • Shell Flyout text missing in Release mode, when using Shell.ItemTemplate #14865
  • The project doesn't know how to run the profile with name 'Windows Machine' and command 'MsixPackage'. #14862
  • Singletap event handler triggered for double mouse click on windows #14859
  • [Shell] GoToAsync("..") from modal page does nothing #14858
  • Dynamic Resources Doesn't Work with AppThemeBinding on ResourceDictionaries #14855
  • Cannot format a Picker's Selected Item #14854
  • The fixed size grid row does not change size on the visibility change #14853

Closed

  • ByteArray as Source in <Image> is not loading when run in Android Version 12 #14635
  • [Bug] Click on an element of one view behind another view. #9153
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ScrollView with VerticalStackLayout and dynamically added child controls incorrectly renders on Android platform (iOS OK). #14737
  • [.net7][iOS] IconImageSource on TabbedPage Causes Crash [MAUI Blazor] [Related #12403] #14850
  • DisplayAlert/DisplayActionSheet/DisplayPrompt not displaying on pushed page on iOS #6522
    Backlog
  • RC2 - Android - WidthRequest does not resize inside a DataTemplate in CollectionView #6541
    Backlog
  • iOS support for NSUserDefaults.DidChangeNotification not working. #14857
  • Remove error property from Obsolete attribute on Properties dictionary #14817
  • cannot use developer tools to debug blazor hybrid MAUI application in Mac OS #14835
  • The linker ignores --linkskip attributes. #14719

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove view from previous containerview #14867
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    community ✨

Merged

  • [tests] Update timeout for iOS template runs #14863
    area/testing

Updated

  • Removing skip attribute from SearchBarHandlerTests.CancelButtonColorInitializeCorrectly on Windows #14852
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Fix Layout issues with the details page on Flyout #12909
    t/breaking 💥, area/layout 🔲, partner/cat 😻, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Adding ContentInsets to iOS Keyboard Scrolling #14371
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • Loading images needs the screen scale #14807
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Backport some net8.0 changes to main #14843
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Make .NET MAUI (Blazor) templates project based #14841
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-01
entry.content:
PullRequests
